cm.model
Class Combatant

java.lang.Object
  cm.model.Combatant
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Combatant>
public class Combatant
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Combatant>

Defines a combatant in a D&D encounter. A combatant is a particular instance of a Stats with some additional encounter-specific information included.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Rinehart <gomamon2k at yahoo.com>

Constructor Summary

          Initializes a blank combatant, with blank Stats.

          Initializes a combatant with provided Stats and role modifier.

public java.lang.Boolean isActive()
Indicates if the combatant is active.

Returns:
getMaxHP() < 1 || getCurrHP() > 0

getDisplayBackColor

public java.awt.Color getDisplayBackColor()
Returns a background color corresponding to the combatant's state.

Returns:
black, if dead; gray, if inactive; green, if PC; red, if enemy

Returns:

getInitSequence

public java.lang.Integer getInitSequence()
Returns a value calculated from getRound(), getInitRoll(), and getRandom3(). This value is used to help sort combatants by initiative.

Returns:
an integer designed to help sort combatants by initiative

getInitSort

public java.lang.String getInitSort()
Returns a string by which the combatant is sorted in the initiative list.

Returns:
a prefix attached to getCombatHandle()

getInitStatus

public java.lang.String getInitStatus()
Returns a string indicating initiative status.

Returns:
one of 'Inactive', 'Ready', 'Delay', 'Rolling', 'Rolled', or 'Reserve'

public void setInitStatus(java.lang.String value)
Sets initiative status to the specified value.

Parameters:
value - the initiative status

max HP

Parameters:

initClear

public void initClear()
Clear initiative-related fields.

modSurges

public void modSurges(java.lang.Integer amt)
Modify the amount of remaining healing surges by the specified amount. No action is taken if the modification would result in a surge amount outside the range 0 - Stats.getSurges().

Parameters:
amt - the amount to adjust the surge count by

resetHealth

public void resetHealth()
Restores the combatant's health and healing surge count to full.

resetInit

public void resetInit()
Resets initiative.

resetPowersUsage

public void resetPowersUsage(java.lang.Boolean resetDaily,
                             java.lang.Boolean resetAction)
Resets power usage for the Combatant.

Parameters:
resetDaily - if true, marks all powers as unused and resets action points to 1
resetAction - if true, only action points are handled

resetTempHP

public void resetTempHP()
Calls setTempHP(Integer) with a parameter of 0.

rollInitiative

public java.lang.Integer rollInitiative()
Roll initiative for this combatant. Gets initiative modifier from Stats.getInit() and calls rollInitiative(Integer).

Returns:
the rolled initiative

unfailDeathSave

public void unfailDeathSave()
Reduces failed death save count by one, to a minimum of 0.

updateLibrary

public void updateLibrary(StatLibrary lib,
                          java.lang.Boolean updateFromLibrary)
Refreshes stats from/to library.

Parameters:
lib - the stat library
updateFromLibrary - if true, the stats are refreshed from the library; otherwise, the current stats are written to the library

exportXML

public void exportXML(javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter writer,
                      java.lang.Boolean ongoing)
               throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
Write combatant details to the XML stream; calls Stats.exportXML(XMLStreamWriter).

Parameters:
writer - the XMLStreamWriter to write to
ongoing - indicates an ongoing encounter; writes additional information when true
Throws:
javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - from the writer

importXML

public java.lang.Boolean importXML(javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader reader)
                            throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                   javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
Imports from an XML stream into the class; calls Stats.importXML(XMLStreamReader).

Parameters:
reader - the XMLStreamReader from which to read the data
Returns:
true if successful, false on error
Throws:
java.lang.NumberFormatException - from Integer.valueOf(String)
javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - from the reader
